transcriptText:
Indian clubs are a great tool to challenge the vestibular system while you're getting a full body workout.

Persian warriors had to face multiple opponents on the battle fields and stay focused in the heat of battle.

You can chose to look straight ahead or use the body in a more optimal way, by turning the head allowing for natural rotation.

At www.heroicsport.com we have created the Pahlavandle, a pair of handles that fit on PET bottles to create adjustable Indian clubs up to 3kg. We also teach you how to swing Indian clubs and provide lots of inspiration on how to include them in your training.

hey Terry from her exporters and me'll turns like this looking at the camera make sure they look good for Instagram I mean it's okay you know you can do that when you're proficient when you learn all you want to challenge your vegetable system you should be doing this kind of stuff right so as you cast the club you look at the end of it traditionally the meals got some stripes to provide visual reference yeah turn and swing and pull down so you're gonna remember that the the meal were used to Train warriors for the battlefields multiple opponents you know they have to look around and and not get dizzy and make sure don't whack the wrong guys so I apply this concept next time you're swinging evening clubs you know you don't just reach across like this but the head follow the head leads and the body follows this allows for a more natural and free rotation from the news hips spine and everything so apply this concept next time you swim in the clubs
rawContent:
![Thumbnail (336x188)](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/JQsw1YYFJHs/hqdefault.jpg?sqp=-oaymwEnCNACELwBSFryq4qpAxkIARUAAIhCGAHYAQHiAQoIGBACGAY4AUAB&rs=AOn4CLCiwHgnxoYiPtUH1UJCLZ6ov1d_xQ)
# [Better Indian clubs back circles / Alternating Meel turns](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JQsw1YYFJHs)

**Visibility**: Public
**Uploaded by**: [Heroic Sport - Indian clubs workouts](http://www.youtube.com/@HeroicSport)
**Uploaded at**: 2018-08-15T22:00:00-07:00
**Published at**: 2018-08-15T22:00:00-07:00
**Length**: 01:07
**Views**: 1728
**Likes**: 35
**Category**: Sports

## Description

```
Indian clubs are a great tool to challenge the vestibular system while you're getting a full body workout.
-
Persian warriors had to face multiple opponents on the battle fields and stay focused in the heat of battle. 
You can chose to look straight ahead or use the body in a more optimal way, by turning the head allowing for natural rotation.

At www.heroicsport.com we have created the Pahlavandle, a pair of handles that fit on PET bottles to create adjustable Indian clubs up to 3kg. We also teach you how to swing Indian clubs and provide lots of inspiration on how to include them in your training.

FIND US ON INSTAGRAM https://www.instagram.com/heroic.sport/
```

## Transcript

hey Terry from her exporters and me'll turns like this looking at the camera make sure they look good for Instagram I mean it's okay you know you can do that when you're proficient when you learn all you want to challenge your vegetable system you should be doing this kind of stuff right so as you cast the club you look at the end of it traditionally the meals got some stripes to provide visual reference yeah turn and swing and pull down so you're gonna remember that the the meal were used to Train warriors for the battlefields multiple opponents you know they have to look around and and not get dizzy and make sure don't whack the wrong guys so I apply this concept next time you're swinging evening clubs you know you don't just reach across like this but the head follow the head leads and the body follows this allows for a more natural and free rotation from the news hips spine and everything so apply this concept next time you swim in the clubs
